00059                         $this->BlockSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00060                         $this->CachedMultyFS = get_package( 'cached_multy_fs' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00061                         $this->Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00062                         $this->Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00063                         $this->String = get_package( 'string' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00064                   }
00065                   catch( Exception $e )
00066                   {

00097             function                process_header_checkbox( $Str , $Changed )
00098             {
00099                   try
00100                   {
00101                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'header_checkbox' ) ; )
00102                         {
00103                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00104                               
00105                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
00106 
00107                               $Template = '{checkbox_ex:self_class=_'.$Name.'_header_checkbox;children_selector=._'.
00108                                     $Name."_item_checkbox;name=$Name}";
00109 
00110                               $Str = str_replace( "{header_checkbox:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00111 
00112                               $Changed = true;
00113                         }
00114                         
00115                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00116                   }
00117                   catch( Exception $e )
00118                   {
00119                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00120                   }
00121             }

00206             function                compile_checkbox_set( $Cols , $CurrentValue , $Records )
00207             {
00208                   try
00209                   {
00210                         $Counter = 0;
00211                         $Code = '';
00212                         
00213                         foreach( $Records as $r )
00214                         {
00215                               if( $Counter == $Cols )
00216                               {
00217                                     $Counter = 0;
00218                                     $Code .= '</tr><tr>';
00219                               }
00220                               $Code .= '<td>{checkbox:name=_id_'.$r->id.';default=1;current_value='.
00221                                     $this->Security->get_gp( '_id_'.$r->id , 'command' , $CurrentValue ).'}&nbsp;'.
00222                                     $r->title.'</td>';
00223                               
00224                               $Counter++;
00225                         }
00226                         
00227                         return( "'<table><tr>$Code</tr></table>" );
00228                   }
00229                   catch( Exception $e )
00230                   {
00231                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00232                   }
00233             }

00261             function                process_checkboxset( $Str , $Changed )
00262             {
00263                   try
00264                   {
00265                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'checkboxset' ) ; )
00266                         {
00267                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00268                               
00269                               $Cols = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'cols' , 3 );
00270                               $CurrentValue = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'checked_all' , '0' ) == '0' ? 'off' : 'on';
00271                               $Query = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'query' );
00272                               $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00273                               $Records = $this->Database->query( $Query );
00274                               $Records = $this->Database->fetch_results( $Records );
00275                               
00276                               $Code = $this->compile_checkbox_set( $Cols , $CurrentValue , $Records );
00277                               
00278                               $Str = str_replace( "{checkboxset:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00279 
00280                               $Changed = true;
00281                         }
00282                         
00283                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00284                   }
00285                   catch( Exception $e )
00286                   {
00287                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00288                   }
00289             }

00317             function                process_checkbox( $Str , $Changed )
00318             {
00319                   try
00320                   {
00321                         $Limitations = array( 'default' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'current_value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
00322                         
00323                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'checkbox' , $Limitations ) ; )
00324                         {
00325                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00326                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'default' , 0 );
00327                               $this->BlockSettings->set_undefined( 'id' , md5( microtime() ) );
00328                               
00329                               $Type = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'type' , 'double' );
00330 
00331                               $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , $Type.'_state_checkbox.tpl' );
00332                               
00333                               $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->BlockSettings->get_raw_settings() );
00334                               
00335                               $Str = str_replace( "{checkbox:$Parameters}" , $Template , $Str );
00336                               $Changed = true;
00337                         }
00338                         
00339                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00340                   }
00341                   catch( Exception $e )
00342                   {
00343                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00344                   }
00345             }

00373             function                process_checkbox_ex( $Str , $Changed )
00374             {
00375                   try
00376                   {
00377                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'checkbox_ex' ) ; )
00378                         {
00379                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
00380                               
00381                               $Id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , '' );
00382                               $Name = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
00383                               $SelfClass = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'self_class' , false );
00384                               $ParentSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'parent_selector' , false );
00385                               $SiblingsSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'siblings_selector' , '.'.$SelfClass );
00386                               $ChildrenSelector = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'children_selector' , false );
00387                               
00388                               $Data = '';
00389                               if( $ParentSelector )
00390                               {
00391                                     $Data .= " parent_selector='$ParentSelector'";
00392                               }
00393                               if( $SiblingsSelector )
00394                               {
00395                                     $Data .= " siblings_selector='$SiblingsSelector'";
00396                               }
00397                               if( $ChildrenSelector )
00398                               {
00399                                     $Data .= " children_selector='$ChildrenSelector'";
00400                               }
00401                               
00402                               $Code = "<input type='checkbox' id='$Id' name='$Name' onclick='ultimix.grids.".
00403                                     "ProcessLinkedCheckboxes( this );' class='$SelfClass' $Data>";
00404                               
00405                               $Str = str_replace( "{checkbox_ex:$Parameters}" , $Code , $Str );
00406 
00407                               $Changed = true;
00408                         }
00409                         
00410                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
00411                   }
00412                   catch( Exception $e )
00413                   {
00414                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00415                   }
00416             }

00448             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00449             {
00450                   try
00451                   {
00452                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_header_checkbox( $Str , $Changed );
00453                         
00454                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_item_checkbox( $Str , $Changed );
00455                         
00456                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_checkboxset( $Str , $Changed );
00457                         
00458                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_checkbox( $Str , $Changed );
00459                         
00460                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_checkbox_ex( $Str , $Changed );
00461 
00462                         return( $Str );
00463                   }
00464                   catch( Exception $e )
00465                   {
00466                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00467                   }
00468             }
